title: 6.2 Master Challenge 3
question:
The avg_global_temp_anomaly list contains the global temperature anomalies (in degrees Celsius) for each year (compared to the 20th-century average).

The co2_emission_million_tonnes list contains the global carbon dioxide emissions for each year (in million metric tons).
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - scratch - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
